attributes.action: Review pay and support of all NHS and support staff in the second wave of COVID.
attributes.additional_details: Increase pay for all NHS workers including support staff and estates roles. Add better financial and emotional support to these workers and more personal protection and safeguarding for our dedicated workers.
attributes.background: The government has addressed previous petitions to increase pay for support staff, but with the current severity of the new wave of the COVID virus this needs to be reviewed.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign one of these petitions which call for similar actions: 

We should increase the pay of our NHS staff by 25%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563356

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151
